Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent

  • public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds implementation of Agent's acting procedures. All new agents should inherit from this class since act() is not implemented, i.e. there is no default act() action for an agent.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long id
      ID of the agent.
      private int inventory
      Number of shares bought or sold.
      private boolean lastOrderTraded
      Is true if an order in the last millisecond resulted in a trade with one of the agent's orders.
      private MatchingEngine matchingEngine
      Matching engine that is used in the simulation.
      private long nextActTime
      Next time that the agent can act.
      private boolean willAct
      Is true if the agent is chosen to act by the Controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(MatchingEngine matchEng)
      Creates an agent object with the ID as a time stamp in milliseconds.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private final long id
        ID of the agent. Used by the Order class to track agents.

      • matchingEngine

        private final MatchingEngine matchingEngine
        Matching engine that is used in the simulation. Should not be changed.

      • nextActTime

        private long nextActTime
        Next time that the agent can act. This is determined in the act() method.

      • willAct

        private boolean willAct
        Is true if the agent is chosen to act by the Controller. Will remain true if the agent still wants to act during a turn.

      • inventory

        private int inventory
        Number of shares bought or sold. If the agent has sold more than it has bought, then this number will be negative.

      • lastOrderTraded

        private boolean lastOrderTraded
        Is true if an order in the last millisecond resulted in a trade with one of the agent's orders. False otherwise.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(MatchingEngine matchEng)
        Creates an agent object with the ID as a time stamp in milliseconds. Must pass in the MatchingEngine that is used for the simulation. Time is set to a negative value so that the agent is not automatically picked to act. The agent is also added automatically to the MatchingEngine's agentMap so that it can keep track of the agent.
        Parameters:
        matchEng - The MatchingEngine of the simulator.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        abstract void act()
        Method to be implemented by subclasses of Agent. Holds different trading strategy code depending on the type of agent desired.

      • getNextActTime

        public long getNextActTime()
        Returns:
        The next time the agent needs to act. This is determined by the act() method.

      • setNextActTime

        public void setNextActTime(long nextTime)

      • getWillAct

        public boolean getWillAct()
        Returns:
        True if the agent still needs to act during its turn. False if it is done for its turn.

      • setWillAct

        public void setWillAct(boolean act)
        Enable the agent to act during its time slot. This is set by the controller when it chooses agents to act for certain time slots.
        Parameters:
        If - true, then the agent will act.

      • cancelOrder

        public void cancelOrder(Order order)
        Calls the MatchingEngine to cancel the agent's order.
        Parameters:
        order - The order that needs to be cancelled.

      • createNewOrder

        public boolean createNewOrder(int price,
                     int initialQuant,
                     boolean buyOrder)
        Calls the MatchingEngine to create a new order for the agent.
        Parameters:
        price - Price of the order (should be in 0.25 increments only).
        initialQuant - The quantity that the agent wants to buy/sell.
        buyOrder - True if the agent wants to buy. False otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if the creation of the order resulted in a trade

      • createMarketOrder

        public void createMarketOrder(int initialQuant,
                     boolean buyOrder)

      • modifyOrder

        public boolean modifyOrder(Order order,
                  int newPrice,
                  int newQuant)
        Calls the MatchingEngine to modify an order
        Parameters:
        order - The order to be modified.
        newPrice - The new price to set the order to.
        newQuant - The new quantity to set the order to.
        Returns:
        True if the modification of this order resulted in a trade.

      • setLastOrderTraded

        public void setLastOrderTraded(boolean traded,
                      int volume)
        Informs the agent whether an order resulted in a trade or not. This is set from the MatchingEngine.
        Parameters:
        traded - True if a trade happened. False otherwise.
        volume - Volume that was traded

      • getBuyPrice

        public int getBuyPrice()

      • getMidPoint

        public int getMidPoint()
        Returns:
        Midpoint between the best ask price and best bid price

      • getMovAvg

        public int getMovAvg()
        Returns:
        The moving average calculated by the matching engine. See the getMovingAverage() method in the MatchingEngine class for more details.

      • getLastAgVolumeBuySide

        public int getLastAgVolumeBuySide()
        Returns:
        The volume of aggressive shares bought in the last millisecond of trading.

      • getLastAgVolumeSellSide

        public int getLastAgVolumeSellSide()
        Returns:
        The volume of aggressive shares bought in the last millisecond of trading.
